item.title: RESETERA Kagari:本来是有FF16的[0-50]
item.description:
RESETERA Kagari:本来是有FF16的 Kagari: "it was supposed to be there" (FFXVI)
https://www.resetera.com/threads ... there-ffxvi.224950/
So it actually was supposed to be there. Myself and others were told it would be so it was likely pulled last minute. Athia is not XVI. Had heard about that as a separate thing entirely.
item.content:encoded:
论演员:
RESETERA Kagari:本来是有FF16的
Kagari: "it was supposed to be there" (FFXVI)
https://www.resetera.com/threads ... there-ffxvi.224950/
So it actually was supposed to be there. Myself and others were told it would be so it was likely pulled last minute. Athia is not XVI. Had heard about that as a separate thing entirely.

芷雅居:
所以下一场是几月？圣莫尼卡摸了这么久新战神续作也能播个片吧
-- 来自 有消息提醒的 Stage1官方 iOS客户端

shizumaru2009:
寂静岭传了这么久应该也有吧，估计是留了一手

zzzplht:
新主机发布会留一手还行，别瞎想了

D-JoeII:
"本來有XXX的"算不算每年定番

雪菜碧池:
微软“我们也有XXX”才是定番

qianoooo:
哈利波特 魔戒 蝙蝠侠路过并且点了个赞

kangkangsama:
不过中间的制作人宣传片有北濑不说，最后大集合吉田还是偏C位的

小米稀饭-:
听着挺马后炮的
